Name: Dutch Count Negroni
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Genever's flavoursome character adds malty notes to an otherwise traditional Negroni.
History: Discovered in 2011 at Vesper Bar, Amsterdam, Netherlands and a cocktail then promoted by Bols Genever. See: Negroni cocktail history .
Nutrition: One serving of Dutch Count Negroni contains 165 calories
